General.Name: US Lithium Corp
General.Description: BioELife Corp. operates in cannabinoid market. It offers cannabinoid products, such as combo adult gummies with chirorub, combo tincture with chirorub, intensive relief rub, tinctures, adult gummies, premium pre-rolls, and flowers. The company was formerly known as US Lithium Corp. and changed its name to BioELife Corp. in March 2020. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Seal Beach, California.
General.Address: 12340 Seal Beach Boulevard, Seal Beach, CA, United States, 90740
